TopicTitle: How to move vertically in EVA?

Articles.Content: Just as the name says, I\'m confused on how to move vertically during EVA. Jeb\'s capsule is above him and he can only move to the sides as it drifts further away.

CTRLSHIFT and SHIFTCTRL for UP and DOWN respectively.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
There are two more keys in controls settings for moving your jetpack up and down. I don\'t remember what they\'re assigned to by default. Check Settings from the main menu.

CTRL and SHIFT for UP and DOWN respectively.

Cheers!

Other way around actually. Shift moves you up and ctrl moves you down.
